abstract: Procter & Gamble reports David S Taylor will take over global beauty unit, after working as president for company's group for global health and grooming, replacing Deb Henretta, who is moving to role created to oversee global online business; moves may offer insight into who will be next chief executive of company.
lead_paragraph: David S. Taylor will take over the company’s beauty unit in a move interpreted to put him one step closer to succeeding the chief executive, A.G. Lafley.
snippet: David S. Taylor will take over the company’s beauty unit in a move interpreted to put him one step closer to succeeding the chief executive, A.G. Lafley.
